articles.title: Activision Opens New Studio Tasked With Creating Narrative-Based AAA Franchise - IGN
articles.description: Activision has announced the formation of Elsewhere Entertainment, a studio dedicated to creating a new AAA narrative franchise. The studio is based in Poland is now hiring.
articles.content:
Activision has announced the formation of Elsewhere Entertainment, a new studio it says will focus on developing a "narrative-based and genre-defining AAA franchise."

articles.title: Google Pixel adding 'Adaptive Vibration' in Android 15 - 9to5Google
articles.description: Google Pixel phones are adding a new "Adaptive Vibration" setting in Android 15 Beta 2 which adjusts vibration strength automatically.
articles.content:
Google had added a clever new “Adaptive Vibration” setting in Android 15 Beta 2 which allows Pixel phones to use their microphones to adjust vibration strength.
